Impacting the lives of 100,000 Bay Area residents every year.

Impact Report 2022

We live in a region that believes in possibility, acts on potential, and is relentless in responding to our communityâ€™s most pressing problems. Together, we can make the Bay Area better for all of us by investing in solutions that create transformative pathways out of poverty.

From Investment to Impact

Last year, Tipping Point supporters stepped up to help our community turn investment dollars into meaningful impact.

Creating Pathways to Prosperity

It is essential to invest in organizations advocating to change the very systems that prevent people from reaching prosperity. By supporting specific policy changes, we help remove barriers to economic mobility for people across the Bay Area.

FIND + FUND

Vet the Most Promising Solutions

Our team of experts rigorously vets every investment we make, providing grantees unrestricted funding for poverty-fighting and life-changing solutions.

PARTNER + STRENGHTEN

Provide Tailored Resources Beyond the Dollar

We help organizations increase impact, providing customized support from strategic planning to leadership development and everything in between.

Investigate + Change

Influence Policy through Research + Advocacy

Tipping Point prevents poverty by investigating the root causes and changing the conditions that hold poverty in place.
